name: U.F.O Offline
description:
That stands for Unending Floating Octopodes - Game where you destroy waves and waves of said UFOs. Simple shooter with small learning curve, that can be played solo or two player co-op.

A game made originally for the Opera GX Game Jam

Player 1 -Red:

  • Move - A, D
  • Shoot - W or H, J

Player 2 -Blue:

  • Move - Left, Right
  • Shoot - Up, CTRL

Toggle sound on/off - M

Reset game - R
